title: My recall does not work. The icon is missing too. Help please.
body:
The recall button usually on B is bugged. It doesn't have the blue whirlwind icon normally, its missing, Ive repaired the client, no effect.

Edit.. My trinket is bugged too. 

http://i.imgur.com/EhWqEdi.jpg

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Is this occurring every game for you? If so, I'd suggest doing a client repair, something may be jumbled in your client. You can do so by: 

* Run League of Legends.
* Click on the '?' button that is located in the top right corner of the window.
* Click Repair.
* Wait. The repair function can take anywhere from 5 minutes to over 30 depending on the number of corrupt files it has to repair.

Lemme know if you're still having this issue after repairing. :)

http://i.imgur.com/EhWqEdi.jpg

So the recall button is see through and trinket button is blank so its assigned to 1 instead.

Making one now. Ive also got my trinkets assigned to the 1-6 numbers instead of being assigned to its original place.

I don't know what might have caused this
